title: Knee Pain Regenerative Programme
description: Ultrasound-guided PRP, Arthrosamid®, and cellular therapies that cushion arthritic knees and restore confident movement.
longDescription: Whether you’re dealing with bone-on-bone osteoarthritis, post-sport flare-ups, or stubborn meniscal pain, our knee programme blends diagnostics, regenerative injections, and rehab to keep you active. We target inflammation, rebuild cartilage support, and strengthen surrounding muscle so you can climb stairs, run meetings, or return to training without fear.

overview.title: A 360° Approach to Knee Relief
overview.content: Your journey starts with diagnostic imaging and gait analysis. We then design a plan combining PRP, Arthrosamid®, adipose cell therapy, or BMAC depending on cartilage wear and symptom severity. Each injection is ultrasound-guided to the exact compartment, followed by personalised strength work and recovery coaching.

faq.question: How soon can I exercise?
faq.answer: Low-impact movement is encouraged within 48 hours. Running usually resumes at 4-6 weeks depending on progress.

faq.question: What’s the difference between PRP and Arthrosamid®?
faq.answer: PRP stimulates healing; Arthrosamid® provides long-lasting cushioning. We’ll recommend the best option based on imaging.

faq.question: Can I combine this with surgery?
faq.answer: Yes. We support prehab before surgery or biologics post-meniscectomy to speed recovery.
